short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds Repo Activity and License Scores to GitHub Repository Page

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: OSS Score adds a section to a public GitHub repo's page that helps developers decide whether or not they want to use the software in their project. A higher score means a repo is better.
